about.title: About me
about.text: I am a software engineer focused on JavaScript technologies. My experience focuses on frontend development using the React js library and the Next js framework. I am committed to my professional growth and stay up to date with the latest technologies and tools. My goal is to become a fullstack developer, so I am expanding my knowledge. Through my constant training, I seek to improve my technical skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1Description: Website update for the Segycom company in Chihuahua, improved performance and SEO with the Next js framework, updated styles and implementation of new modules
projects.project2Description: Next Store Uniforms is a company that is dedicated to the sale of work uniforms, I developed this website so that it would function as an ecommerce, so that customers can see the catalog of the company's products
projects.project3Description: Web portfolio to show my skills, projects I have worked on and information about me.
projects.project4Description: Segycom Chihuahua is a company that sells security and communication equipment, focused on emergency vehicles. I developed its website to make it easier for customers to view and quote its products.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you want to contact me, you can do so through social networks or by filling out the contact form. I will answer you as soon as possible.
